Text:
hiya STFmaryville!

Dunno if i approached this correctly (if not PLEASE forgive my ignorance!) but i PM'd you @SuperBay Pirate Bay Forum re: a comic request.  Hope you are able to help!

imsandee, that's quite alright, just f.y.i. i don't check my suprbay PM box as often as i should. i read comments on my last 1-2 days of posts here almost every day, so that's the fastest, although not private, way to reach me!  ;-)

i'll go get your message now!
Thanx for your speedy reply!  Any chance you'll be able to help?  Lemme know one way or the other, k?
i've already found a torrent that has the scan. hopefully i can get it downloaded 100%. fingers crossed.

So close...
Fingers crossed on this end as well!
Much obliged.

You are my favorite person EVER!  Feel free to call upon me--anytime & anywhere.

I'm forever indebted to you.
